Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Enum ReadWriteListener.Type

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ReadWriteListener.Type>
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.ReadWriteListener.Type
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UsesCustomNull, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ReadWriteListener.Type>
    Enclosing interface:
    ReadWriteListener
    public static enum ReadWriteListener.Type
extends java.lang.Enum<ReadWriteListener.Type>
implements UsesCustomNull
    The type of operation for a ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent - read, write, poll, etc.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      DISABLING_NOTIFICATION
      Opposite of ENABLING_NOTIFICATION.
      ENABLING_NOTIFICATION
      Associated with BleDevice.enableNotify(UUID, ReadWriteListener) and called when enabling the notification completes by writing to the Descriptor of the given UUID.
      NULL
      As of now, only used for DeviceReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent.txnFailReason() in some cases.
      POLL
      Associated with BleDevice.startPoll(UUID, Interval, ReadWriteListener) or BleDevice.startRssiPoll(Interval, ReadWriteListener).
      PSUEDO_NOTIFICATION
      Associated with BleDevice.startChangeTrackingPoll(UUID, Interval, ReadWriteListener) or BleDevice.enableNotify(UUID, Interval, ReadWriteListener) where a force-read timeout is invoked.
      READ
      Associated with BleDevice.read(UUID, ReadWriteListener) or BleDevice.readRssi(ReadWriteListener).
      WRITE
      Associated with BleDevice.write(UUID, byte[]) or BleDevice.write(UUID, byte[], ReadWriteListener) or BleDevice.negotiateMtu(int) or BleDevice.setName(String, UUID, ReadWriteListener).
      WRITE_NO_RESPONSE
      Similar to WRITE but under the hood BluetoothGattCharacteristic.WRITE_TYPE_NO_RESPONSE is used.
      WRITE_SIGNED
      Similar to WRITE but under the hood BluetoothGattCharacteristic.WRITE_TYPE_SIGNED is used.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • NULL

        public static final ReadWriteListener.Type NULL
        As of now, only used for DeviceReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent.txnFailReason() in some cases.

      • READ

        public static final ReadWriteListener.Type READ
        Associated with BleDevice.read(UUID, ReadWriteListener) or BleDevice.readRssi(ReadWriteListener).

      • WRITE

        public static final ReadWriteListener.Type WRITE
        Associated with BleDevice.write(UUID, byte[]) or BleDevice.write(UUID, byte[], ReadWriteListener) or BleDevice.negotiateMtu(int) or BleDevice.setName(String, UUID, ReadWriteListener).
        See Also:
        isWrite()

      • WRITE_NO_RESPONSE

        public static final ReadWriteListener.Type WRITE_NO_RESPONSE
        Similar to WRITE but under the hood BluetoothGattCharacteristic.WRITE_TYPE_NO_RESPONSE is used. See also BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PROPERTY_WRITE_NO_RESPONSE.
        See Also:
        isWrite()

      • WRITE_SIGNED

        public static final ReadWriteListener.Type WRITE_SIGNED
        Similar to WRITE but under the hood BluetoothGattCharacteristic.WRITE_TYPE_SIGNED is used. See also BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PROPERTY_SIGNED_WRITE.
        See Also:
        isWrite()

      • POLL

        public static final ReadWriteListener.Type POLL
        Associated with BleDevice.startPoll(UUID, Interval, ReadWriteListener) or BleDevice.startRssiPoll(Interval, ReadWriteListener).

      • PSUEDO_NOTIFICATION

        public static final ReadWriteListener.Type PSUEDO_NOTIFICATION
        Associated with BleDevice.startChangeTrackingPoll(UUID, Interval, ReadWriteListener) or BleDevice.enableNotify(UUID, Interval, ReadWriteListener) where a force-read timeout is invoked. You should never see this ReadWriteListener.Type via GenericListener_Void.onEvent(Event). Any event with this type will be emitted in the NotificationListener.

      • ENABLING_NOTIFICATION

        public static final ReadWriteListener.Type ENABLING_NOTIFICATION
        Associated with BleDevice.enableNotify(UUID, ReadWriteListener) and called when enabling the notification completes by writing to the Descriptor of the given UUID. ReadWriteListener.Status.SUCCESS doesn't necessarily mean that notifications will definitely now work (there may be other issues in the underlying stack), but it's a reasonable guarantee.

      • DISABLING_NOTIFICATION

        public static final ReadWriteListener.Type DISABLING_NOTIFICATION
        Opposite of ENABLING_NOTIFICATION.

      • isRead

        public final boolean isRead()
        Returns true for every ReadWriteListener.Type except isWrite(). Overall this convenience method is meant to tell you when we've received something from the device as opposed to writing something to it.

      • isWrite

        public final boolean isWrite()
        Returns true if this is WRITE or WRITE_NO_RESPONSE or WRITE_SIGNED.

      • toHistoricalDataSource

        public final BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Source toHistoricalDataSource()
        Returns the BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Source equivalent for this ReadWriteListener.Type, or BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Source.NULL.
